vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.16.1; married to Abraham (H0085);
mother of: Ishmael (H3458)
Also named: Agar<\i> (Ἄγαρ "Hagar" G0028)
§ Hagar = "flight"
Sarah's Egyptian slave girl, Abraham's concubine, Ishmael's mother
vocabInfos._es_Definition: esclava de Abraham; madre de Ismael
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
夏甲 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "逃跑"
撒萊的埃及使女, 亞伯拉罕的妾, 以實瑪利的母親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
夏甲 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "逃跑"
撒莱的埃及使女, 亚伯拉罕的妾, 以实玛利的母亲
